devdoc.author: Ghaieth BEN MOUSSA
devdoc.details: This contract is used to award degrees to students who graduated in two steps: 1. Only the owner of the contract can issue degrees with the function `issueDegree(address to, uint256 score)` 2. Then, the student can claim the degree with the function `claimDegree()` This type of token is called a Soul Bound Token because once the token  has been claimed by the student, it can not be transfered to anyone else.
devdoc.title: UniversityDegree

userdoc.notice: Non-transferable Soul Bound Token (NFT) smart contract for university degrees and diplomas
